sections.heading: District; petition requirements
sections.text: The petition for the original creation of a district shall conform to the requirements of section 32-628.SourceLaws 1933, c. 86, § 3, p. 339;Laws 1937, c. 152, § 3, p. 579;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 70-703;Laws 1943, c. 145, § 1(4), p. 508;R.S.1943, § 70-606;Laws 1994, LB 76,
